REVERT_EDGE_BUTTON_DESC: Reverse the direction of the selected edge
DELETE_BUTTON_DESC: Deletes the selected node or edge
EXEC_QUERY_GRAPH_BUTTON_DESC: Execute the query and display as a graph in a new window
EXEC_QUERY_BUTTON_DESC: Run the query and display the results as a table
CONFIRM_NEW_QUERY: Are you sure you want to launch a new query ?
NODE_TYPE_ELEMENT_DESC: Node representing a variable data with a predefined data type.
NODE_TYPE_DATA_DESC: Node corresponding to a fixed data.
CHANGE_LANG_VALIDATION: The page will be reloaded, all unsaved data will be lost. Are you sure?
GRAPH_TOO_MANY_DATA_START: The creation of the graph will be long because there are
GRAPH_TOO_MANY_DATA_END: lines of results. Are you sure you want to load the graph?
DRAW_GRAPH_IMPOSSIBLE_NO_RESULTS: Unable to view the graph: No results
QUERY_VALIDITY_NODE_NO_EDGE: One of your nodes is not linked to any other node
QUERY_VALIDITY_NODE_NAME_EMPTY: The name of one of your nodes is empty
QUERY_VALIDITY_NODE_NAME_WITH_SPACE: The name of one of your nodes contains a space
QUERY_VALIDITY_NODE_NAME_ALREADY_EXIST: The name of one of your nodes already exists
QUERY_VALIDITY_NODE_URI_EMPTY: The URI of one of your nodes is empty
QUERY_VALIDITY_NODE_FILTER_EMPTY_VALUE: One of your filter nodes has an empty value
QUERY_VALIDITY_EDGE_URI_EMPTY: The URI of one of your fixed edges is empty
QUERY_VALIDITY_TWO_NODE_FILTER_LINKED: Impossible to link two nodes of type Filter
QUERY_VALIDITY_NODE_FILTER_AND_DATA_LINK: Impossible to link a node of type Data to a node of type Filter
QUERY_VALIDITY_EDGE_NAME_EMPTY: The name of one of your edges is empty
QUERY_VALIDITY_EDGE_NAME_WITH_SPACE: The name of one of your edges contains a space
QUERY_VALIDITY_EDGE_NAME_ALREADY_EXIST: The name of one of your edges already exists
QUERY_VALIDITY_EDGE_WITH_FILTER_NO_FIXED: Edges with a filter must be of Fixed type
